ygData.subject: Re: Fish Scales
ygData.msgSnippet: The fish there do drop scales, but not enough for you to rely solely on them, IMHO.  Fish scales can be purchased in bulk from one of the merchants near Inn 3
ygData.messageBody:
The fish there do drop scales, but not enough for you to rely solely
on them, IMHO. Fish scales can be purchased in bulk from one of the
merchants near Inn 3 in the east commonlands (bat wings too). A good
idea would be to have a magician summon a couple of the appropriate
rings or stones for everyone who doesn't have a Fishbone Earring or
an Aqualung or a Rebreather. That way they have something ready in
case of an emergency.


Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 writes:
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> I can't answer your question about bulk purchases but I do know a lot of the
> the fishes you kill in Kedge drop fish scales so it shouldn't be hard for
> rangers/druids to replenish their supplies while they are down there.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
> > The talk of Kedge Keep has me very interested and my Guild Leader and
> > I've been planning an outing on ICQ. The question is; short of fishing;
> > where can Fish Scales be purchased in bulk?
> >
> >
>
